activities: MedAire joined the International SOS Group of companies in 2008. MedAire provides medical assistance and travel security to the passengers and crew in the air, on land and at sea.  For that purpose MedAire may collect information related to travel itineraries and limited health information used only for the purpose of rendering assistance. Personal information is collected directly from individuals when they choose to provide their personal information to MedAire after subscribing to products or services sold by MedAire.
contactoff1: 111 Town Square Place, Suite 415, Jersey City, New Jersey 07310
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

TRUSTe
International SOS adheres to Binding Corporate Rules approved by CNIL (the Data Protection Authority of France) in 2010
